thread.section_title: Arbor City Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good Modern Hotel!!
thread.title_full: Good Modern Hotel!! - Review of Arbor City Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: DowleS
title: Good Modern Hotel!!
text: Stayed for 1 night and had a double room on the 4th floor. Room was very modern clean and tidy. Shower room very good with a good size shower cubicle. Fair price paid which included continental breakfast. We upgraded our breakfast to full English for an extra Â£5.00. All staff very friendly. Would stay again. Aldgate East station just round the corner.
